title: Publish the updated Valentine page copy live

requirements.text: Deploy/publish the current application version so the updated home-screen prompt text ("Maniha will you be my valentines") is live and visible at the shareable link: https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c2016-f519-7768-a217-0bd548a606d8.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c2016-f519-7768-a217-0bd548a606d8 shows the latest deployed version (not a draft-only state).
The home screen main prompt text displays exactly: "Maniha will you be my valentines".
A hard refresh / incognito window still shows the updated deployed content.

constraints: Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce additional backend services; keep Motoko logic (if any) within backend/main.mo single-actor architecture.
nonGoals: Changing any existing UI copy beyond what is already implemented.
Adding new features, flows, or authentication changes.
